title: IBody2.MakeOffset
description: Creates a new temporary body by offsetting the selected surface body by the specified distance and in the specified direction.
signature:
Body2 MakeOffset( 
   System.Double
Distance
,
   System.Boolean
Direction
)

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance by which to offset the selected surface body

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description: True to offset the selected surface body in the opposite direction, false to offset the surface body along the normal

returns: Pointer to the newly created body
remarks: This method only supports surface bodies.
